channel.title: ServerStatus?
channel.description:
Okay,
So ForeverPkers linked their Vote4Cash to down vote me due to my idiotic players constantly spamming his server. I worked out the problem with James, the owner, but another problem persists. I had problems with my VPS, so I got a new one--with a new IP. Apparently, the owner of SnakeGaming bought a VPS from the same company I bought mine from, and coincidentally got My old VPS's IP. So now he has -1.1K votes, and I have his server posted. I don't know where to post this, so I guessed here would be fine. I need this fixed as soon as possible--this is the last problem that persists til I can post my server around again.
Thanks, Sam

item.title: ServerStatus?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Try private messaging MITB about your issue, we can’t do anything, unfortunately.

Read full topic
